#summary Maven dependency

= Maven dependency =

You can use the following dependency definition in your pom.xml (as soon as the project leaves the staging repository on maven central):

{{{
<dependency>
  <groupId>com.googlecode.sizeofag</groupId>
  <artifactId>sizeofag</artifactId>
  <version>1.0.0</version>
</dependency>
}}}
